description: Complete wood log texture system with side grain and top/bottom rings

top.description: Concentric ring pattern for top/bottom faces

sides.description: Vertical grain pattern for side faces

bottom.description: Same ring pattern as top face

wood_side.step2: Calculate local ring position: ringX = globalX % texturePixelSize
wood_side.step4: Apply combined colors: r = 120 + woodGrain * 60 * ringEffect
wood_side.step5: Calculate distance to tile center for knot detection
wood_side.step6: Apply knot darkening if distance < 3 and tile frequency matches
wood_side.note: Combines vertical grain with horizontal ring effects and occasional knots

wood_top.step1: Calculate tile-relative coordinates: dx = (globalX % size) - size/2
wood_top.step2: Calculate distance from center: sqrt(dx² + dy²)
wood_top.note: Creates concentric tree rings radiating from tile center

metadata.purpose: Complete JSON conversion of wood log with side and top/bottom faces
metadata.block_faces: Complete wood log - sides (vertical grain), top/bottom (concentric rings)

technical_notes.complexity: Advanced multi-algorithm system with coordinate transformations
unique_features: Vertical grain generation using globalY coordinates
Horizontal ring effects using modulo coordinates
Distance-based knot patterns with tile frequency
Concentric rings using radial distance calculation
Different base colors for side vs top faces
technical_notes.implementation_challenge: Universal generator needs support for coordinate transformations and distance calculations
technical_notes.wood_characteristics: Realistic wood grain with side texture showing vertical growth and top showing tree rings
